title: SkillsCard Body
description: Defines a reusable behavior pattern (skill) that AI agents can discover and load.

status.description: Trust level: curated (core team), verified (sandbox-tested), community (author-verified)

format.description: Skill content format. claude-skill-v1 is primary; markdown and yaml-frontmatter are engine-agnostic fallbacks.

engine_compatibility.description: Which AI engines can use this skill

content_path.description: Relative path to skill content file within the cards repo (e.g. 'skills/code-review/skill.md')

inputs.description: What the skill expects as input context (e.g. ['codebase', 'diff'])

examples.description: Usage examples showing prompt and expected behavior

dependencies.description: Other skill slugs this skill depends on (optional)
